translated: the stages of the śrāvakas, pratyekabuddhas, bodhisattvas, and buddhas, do not take ordinary beings, śrāvakas,

original: 獨覺、菩薩、佛法，不緣神通、智見，不緣解🔽脫，不緣解脫智見，不緣涅槃，不緣過去未來
analyzed: 獨覺、菩薩、佛法，不緣神通、智見，不緣解 脫，不緣解脫智見，不緣涅槃，不緣過去未來
translated: pratyekabuddhas, bodhisattvas, and buddhas as objects, do not take supernormal knowledge and insight as objects, do not take

original: 現在智見，不緣佛智、力、無畏等，不緣佛土
analyzed: 現在智見，不緣佛智、力、無畏等，不緣佛土
translated: liberation as an object, do not take the insight of liberation as an object, do not take nirvāṇa as an object, do not take the insight of knowledge of the past, future, and present as an object, do not take the knowledge, powers, and fearlessnesses of a buddha as objects, do not take the purification of a buddha land

original: 清淨，不緣相好清淨，不緣聲聞圓滿，不緣獨
analyzed: 清淨，不緣相好清淨，不緣聲聞圓滿，不緣獨
translated: as an object, do not take the purification of the major and minor marks as an object, do not take the perfection of śrāvakas as an object, do not take the perfection of pratyekabuddhas

original: 覺圓滿，不緣菩薩圓滿。
analyzed: 覺圓滿，不緣菩薩圓滿。
translated: as an object, do not take the perfection of bodhisattvas as an object.

original: 何以故？
analyzed: 何以故？
translated: Why is it so?

original: 善勇猛！
analyzed: 善勇猛！
translated: Good and brave one!

original: 以一切法非所緣故，以一切法非能緣故，非一切法有所取故，而可於彼說有所緣。
analyzed: 以一切法非所緣故，以一切法非能緣故，非一切法有所取故，而可於彼說有所緣。
translated: Because all dharmas are not objects, because all dharmas are not subjects, and because all dharmas are not grasped, one can speak of objects in them.

original: 「善勇猛！
analyzed: 「善勇猛！
translated: Good and brave one!

original: 若有所緣即有動作、計著、執取，若有執取即有憂苦，猛利愁箭、悲惱歎生。
analyzed: 若有所緣即有動作、計著、執取，若有執取即有憂苦，猛利愁箭、悲惱歎生。
translated: If there is an object, then there is activity, attachment, and grasping. If there is grasping, then there is worry, suffering, sharp sorrow, and lamentation.

original: 善勇猛！
analyzed: 善勇猛！
translated: Good son!

original: 若有所緣即有繫縛，無出離道，由斯一切憂苦增長。
analyzed: 若有所緣即有繫縛，無出離道，由斯一切憂苦增長。
translated: If there is an object, then there is bondage, no path of liberation, and thus all worry and suffering increase.

original: 善勇猛！
analyzed: 善勇猛！
translated: Good son!

original: 若有所緣即有恃執、動轉、戲論，若有所緣即有種種鬪訟、違諍，若有所緣即有種種無明、癡闇，若有所緣即有恐怖，若有所緣即有魔羂及有魔縛，若有所緣即有苦逼及求安樂。
analyzed: 若有所緣即有恃執、動轉、戲論，若有所緣即有種種鬪訟、違諍，若有所緣即有種種無明、癡闇，若有所緣即有恐怖，若有所緣即有魔羂及有魔縛，若有所緣即有苦逼及求安樂。
translated: If there is an object, then there is reliance, movement, and idle speculation. If there is an object, then there are various disputes and disagreements. If there is an object, then there are various kinds of ignorance and delusion. If there is an object, then there is fear. If there is an object, then there are the snares of Mara and the bonds of Mara. If there is an object, then there is suffering and the seeking of happiness.

original: 善勇猛！
analyzed: 善勇猛！
translated: Good son!

original: 菩薩觀見有如是等種種過患，不緣諸法，無所緣故，於一切法則無所取，無所取故，於一切法無執而住。
analyzed: 菩薩觀見有如是等種種過患，不緣諸法，無所緣故，於一切法則無所取，無所取故，於一切法無執而住。
translated: The bodhisattva sees these various faults and does not take objects. Because there are no objects, he does not grasp at any dharmas. Because there is nothing to grasp, he abides without attachment to any dharmas.

original: 如是菩薩雖無所緣，而於境界得定自在，雖於境界得定自在，而無恃執亦無所住。
analyzed: 如是菩薩雖無所緣，而於境界得定自在，雖於境界得定自在，而無恃執亦無所住。
translated: In this way, although bodhisattvas have no objects, they attain mastery over the sense fields. Although they attain mastery over the sense fields, they have no reliance or dwelling.

original: 善勇猛！
analyzed: 善勇猛！
translated: Good son!

original: 若諸菩薩能如是行，於一切法能不攀緣，無所執著、無所諍論，於一切法無染而住。
analyzed: 若諸菩薩能如是行，於一切法能不攀緣，無所執著、無所諍論，於一切法無染而住。
translated: If bodhisattvas are able to practice in this way, they will be able to not grasp at any phenomena, be without attachment, and without disputes. They will abide in non-attachment to all phenomena.

original: 善勇猛！
analyzed: 善勇猛！
translated: Good son!

original: 是諸菩薩普於一切所緣境法皆得離繫，修行般若波羅蜜多。
analyzed: 是諸菩薩普於一切所緣境法皆得離繫，修行般若波羅蜜多。
translated: These bodhisattvas will attain liberation from all conditioned phenomena and practice the perfection of wisdom.

original: 「善勇猛！
analyzed: 「善勇猛！
translated: Good son!

original: 若諸菩薩能如是行、能如是住，修行般若波羅蜜多速得圓滿，一切惡魔不能障礙，魔軍眷屬不能攝持，欲求其短終不能得，亦復不能方便擾亂；
analyzed: 若諸菩薩能如是行、能如是住，修行般若波羅蜜多速得圓滿，一切惡魔不能障礙，魔軍眷屬不能攝持，欲求其短終不能得，亦復不能方便擾亂；
translated: If bodhisattvas are able to practice in this way and abide in this way, they will quickly perfect the practice of the perfection of wisdom. No evil māras will be able to obstruct them, and the māra-demons will not be able to possess them. Those who seek their weaknesses will never be able to find them, and they will also not be able to disturb them with skillful means;

original: 而能降伏魔及魔軍，普能覺知一切魔事，不隨魔事自在而行，震動焚燒諸魔宮殿；
analyzed: 而能降伏魔及魔軍，普能覺知一切魔事，不隨魔事自在而行，震動焚燒諸魔宮殿；
translated: And yet they are able to subdue Māra and his army, and are able to fully awaken to all demonic activities, not acting freely in accordance with demonic activities, and shaking and burning the palaces of Māra;

original: 亦能降伏一切外道，不為外道之所降伏；
analyzed: 亦能降伏一切外道，不為外道之所降伏；
translated: They are also able to subdue all non-Buddhists, and are not subdued by non-Buddhists;

original: 亦能摧滅一切他論，不為他論之所摧滅。
analyzed: 亦能摧滅一切他論，不為他論之所摧滅。
translated: They are also able to destroy all other teachings, and are not destroyed by other teachings.

original: 「復次，善勇猛！
analyzed: 「復次，善勇猛！
translated: Furthermore, Subhūti!

original: 若諸菩薩能如是行，則於色不住分別、無異分別，於受、想、行、識亦不住分別、無異分別；
analyzed: 若諸菩薩能如是行，則於色不住分別、無異分別，於受、想、行、識亦不住分別、無異分別；
translated: If bodhisattvas are able to practice in this way, then they do not abide in discrimination or nondiscrimination regarding form, and they also do not abide in discrimination or nondiscrimination regarding feeling, perception, formation, and consciousness;

original: 於眼不住分別、無異分別，於耳、鼻、舌、身、意亦不住分別、無異分別；
analyzed: 於眼不住分別、無異分別，於耳、鼻、舌、身、意亦不住分別、無異分別；
translated: They do not abide in discrimination or nondiscrimination regarding the eye, and they also do not abide in discrimination or nondiscrimination regarding the ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind;

original: 於色不住分別、無異分別，於聲、香、味、觸、法亦不住分別、無異分別；
analyzed: 於色不住分別、無異分別，於聲、香、味、觸、法亦不住分別、無異分別；
translated: They do not abide in discrimination or nondiscrimination regarding form, and they also do not abide in discrimination or nondiscrimination regarding sound, smell, taste, touch, and dharmas;

original: 於眼識不住分別、無異分別，於耳、鼻、舌、身、意識亦不住分別、無異分別。
analyzed: 於眼識不住分別、無異分別，於耳、鼻、舌、身、意識亦不住分別、無異分別。
translated: They do not dwell in discrimination or nondiscrimination regarding eye consciousness, and likewise for ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind consciousness.

original: 由此因緣，是諸菩薩於諸名、色不起分別、無異分別；
analyzed: 由此因緣，是諸菩薩於諸名、色不起分別、無異分別；
translated: For this reason, these bodhisattvas do not give rise to discrimination or nondiscrimination regarding names and forms;

original: 於諸染、淨不起分別、無異分別，於諸緣起不起分別、無異分別；
analyzed: 於諸染、淨不起分別、無異分別，於諸緣起不起分別、無異分別；
translated: They do not give rise to discrimination or nondiscrimination regarding defilement and purity, and do not give rise to discrimination or nondiscrimination regarding dependent arising;

original: 於諸顛倒、見蓋、愛行不起分別、無異分別，於諸斷、常不起分別、無異分別；
analyzed: 於諸顛倒、見蓋、愛行不起分別、無異分別，於諸斷、常不起分別、無異分別；
translated: They do not give rise to discrimination or nondiscrimination regarding the four inverted views, the five hindrances, and the six kinds of craving, and do not give rise to discrimination or nondiscrimination regarding annihilationism and eternalism;

original: 於欲、色、無色界不起分別、無異分別；
analyzed: 於欲、色、無色界不起分別、無異分別；
translated: They do not give rise to discrimination or nondiscrimination regarding the realms of desire, form, and formlessness;

original: 於有情界、法界不起分別、無異分別，於貪、瞋、癡不起分別、無異分別；
analyzed: 於有情界、法界不起分別、無異分別，於貪、瞋、癡不起分別、無異分別；
translated: They do not give rise to discrimination or nondiscrimination regarding the realms of sentient beings and dharmas, and do not give rise to discrimination or nondiscrimination regarding greed, hatred, and delusion;

original: 於諦實、虛妄不起分別、無異分別；
analyzed: 於諦實、虛妄不起分別、無異分別；
translated: They do not give rise to discrimination or nondiscrimination regarding truth and falsehood;

original: 於地、水、火、風、空、識界不起分別、無異分別；
analyzed: 於地、水、火、風、空、識界不起分別、無異分別；
translated: They do not give rise to discrimination or differentiation regarding the elements of earth, water, fire, wind, space, and consciousness;

original: 於有繫、離繫不起分別、無異分別；
analyzed: 於有繫、離繫不起分別、無異分別；
translated: They do not give rise to discrimination or differentiation regarding bondage and liberation;

original: 於我、有情、命者、生者、養者、士夫、補特伽羅、意生、儒童、作者、受者、知者、見者及彼諸想不起分別、無異分別；
analyzed: 於我、有情、命者、生者、養者、士夫、補特伽羅、意生、儒童、作者、受者、知者、見者及彼諸想不起分別、無異分別；
translated: They do not give rise to discrimination or differentiation regarding the various concepts of self, sentient beings, life, birth, nurturing, person, pudgala, mind-born, youth, doer, experiencer, knower, seer, and so forth;

original: 於布施、慳貪、持戒、犯戒、安忍、忿恚、精進、懈怠、靜慮、散亂、般若、惡慧不起分別、無異分別；
analyzed: 於布施、慳貪、持戒、犯戒、安忍、忿恚、精進、懈怠、靜慮、散亂、般若、惡慧不起分別、無異分別；
translated: They do not give rise to discrimination or differentiation regarding generosity and stinginess, morality and immorality, patience and anger, diligence and laziness, concentration and distraction, wisdom and ignorance;

original: 於念住、正斷、神足、根、力、覺支、道支不起分別、無異分別；
analyzed: 於念住、正斷、神足、根、力、覺支、道支不起分別、無異分別；
translated: They do not give rise to discrimination or differentiation regarding the applications of mindfulness, right efforts, bases of supernatural powers, faculties, powers, factors of awakening, and factors of the path;

original: 於顛倒等斷不起分別、無異分別；
analyzed: 於顛倒等斷不起分別、無異分別；
translated: They do not give rise to discrimination or differentiation regarding the abandonment of the inverted views and so forth;

original: 於靜慮、解脫、等持、等至不起分別、無異分別；
analyzed: 於靜慮、解脫、等持、等至不起分別、無異分別；
translated: They do not give rise to discrimination or differentiation regarding the meditative absorptions, liberations, samādhis, and samāpattis;

original: 於苦、集、滅、道不起分別、無異分別，於慈、悲、喜、捨不起分別、無異分別；
analyzed: 於苦、集、滅、道不起分別、無異分別，於慈、悲、喜、捨不起分別、無異分別；
translated: They do not give rise to discrimination or differentiation regarding suffering, its origin, its cessation, and the path, and they do not give rise to discrimination or differentiation regarding loving-kindness, compassion, joy, and equanimity;

original: 於盡智、無生智、無造作智不起分別、無異分別；
analyzed: 於盡智、無生智、無造作智不起分別、無異分別；
translated: They do not give rise to discrimination or differentiation regarding the cognition of exhaustion, the cognition of non-arising, and the cognition of non-fabrication;

original: 於諸異生、聲聞、獨覺、菩薩、佛地不起分別、無異分別，於諸異生、聲聞、獨覺、菩薩、佛法不起分別、無異分別；
analyzed: 於諸異生、聲聞、獨覺、菩薩、佛地不起分別、無異分別，於諸異生、聲聞、獨覺、菩薩、佛法不起分別、無異分別；
translated: They do not give rise to discrimination or differentiation regarding the stages of ordinary beings, śrāvakas, pratyekabuddhas, bodhisattvas, and buddhas, and they do not give rise to discrimination or differentiation regarding the dharmas of ordinary beings, śrāvakas, pratyekabuddhas, bodhisattvas, and buddhas;

original: 於神通、智見不起分別、無異分別，於過去未來現在智見不起分別、無異分別；
analyzed: 於神通、智見不起分別、無異分別，於過去未來現在智見不起分別、無異分別；
translated: They do not give rise to discrimination or differentiation regarding the cognition and vision of the supernormal powers, and they do not give rise to discrimination or differentiation regarding the cognition and vision of the past, future, and present;

original: 於無著智見不起分別、無異分別；
analyzed: 於無著智見不起分別、無異分別；
translated: They do not give rise to discrimination or differentiation regarding the cognition and vision of non-attachment;

original: 於明、解脫不起分別、無異分別；
analyzed: 於明、解脫不起分別、無異分別；
translated: They do not give rise to discrimination or differentiation regarding illumination and liberation;

original: 於解脫及解脫智見不起分別、無異分別；
analyzed: 於解脫及解脫智見不起分別、無異分別；
translated: They do not give rise to discrimination or differentiation regarding liberation and the wisdom and insight of liberation;

original: 於諸佛智、力、無畏等不起分別、無異分別；
analyzed: 於諸佛智、力、無畏等不起分別、無異分別；
translated: They do not give rise to discrimination or differentiation regarding the wisdom, powers, and fearlessnesses of the buddhas;

original: 於相好清淨不起分別、無異分別；
analyzed: 於相好清淨不起分別、無異分別；
translated: They do not give rise to discrimination or differentiation regarding the purity of the marks;

original: 於佛土清淨不起分別、無異分別；
analyzed: 於佛土清淨不起分別、無異分別；
translated: They do not give rise to discrimination or differentiation regarding the purity of the buddha-lands;

original: 於聲聞圓滿不起分別、無異分別；
analyzed: 於聲聞圓滿不起分別、無異分別；
translated: They do not give rise to discrimination or differentiation regarding the perfection of the śrāvakas;

original: 於獨覺圓滿不起分別、無異分別；
analyzed: 於獨覺圓滿不起分別、無異分別；
translated: They do not give rise to discrimination or differentiation regarding the perfection of the pratyekabuddhas;

original: 於菩薩圓滿不起分別、無異分別。
analyzed: 於菩薩圓滿不起分別、無異分別。
translated: They do not give rise to discrimination or differentiation regarding the perfection of the bodhisattvas.

original: 「何以故？
analyzed: 「何以故？
translated: Why is it so?

original: 善勇猛！
analyzed: 善勇猛！
translated: Good son!

original: 若有分別則異分別，若於是處無有分別則於是處無異分別。
analyzed: 若有分別則異分別，若於是處無有分別則於是處無異分別。
translated: If there is discrimination, then there is differentiation. If there is no discrimination here, then there is no differentiation here.

original: 愚夫異生一切皆是分別所起，彼想皆從異分別起，是故菩薩不起分別、無異分別。
analyzed: 愚夫異生一切皆是分別所起，彼想皆從異分別起，是故菩薩不起分別、無異分別。
translated: All foolish ordinary beings are entirely arisen from discrimination. Those thoughts all arise from different discriminations. Therefore, bodhisattvas do not give rise to discrimination, nor do they have different discriminations.

original: 「善勇猛！
analyzed: 「善勇猛！
translated: Subhūti!

original: 言分別者是第一邊，異分別者是第二邊，若於是處不起分別、無異分別，則於是處遠離二邊亦無有中。
analyzed: 言分別者是第一邊，異分別者是第二邊，若於是處不起分別、無異分別，則於是處遠離二邊亦無有中。
translated: What is called discrimination is one extreme, and different discrimination is a second extreme. If one does not give rise to discrimination or different discrimination in this place, then in this place one is far removed from the two extremes and there is no middle either.

original: 善勇猛！
analyzed: 善勇猛！
translated: Subhūti!

original: 若謂有中亦是分別，分別中者亦謂有邊。
analyzed: 若謂有中亦是分別，分別中者亦謂有邊。
translated: If one says there is a middle, that is also discrimination. Discrimination of the middle is also said to be an extreme.

original: 若於是處有分別者，則於是處有異分別，由此因緣、無斷分別、異分別義；
analyzed: 若於是處有分別者，則於是處有異分別，由此因緣、無斷分別、異分別義；
translated: If in this place there is discrimination, then in this place there will be different discrimination. For this reason, there is no meaning of cutting off discrimination and different discrimination;

original: 若於是處無分別者，則於是處無異分別，由此因緣、有斷分別、異分別義。
analyzed: 若於是處無分別者，則於是處無異分別，由此因緣、有斷分別、異分別義。
translated: if in this place there is no discrimination, then in this place there will be no different discrimination. For this reason, there is the meaning of cutting off discrimination and different discrimination.

original: 善勇猛！
analyzed: 善勇猛！
translated: Subhūti!

original: 斷分別者，謂於此中都無所斷。
analyzed: 斷分別者，謂於此中都無所斷。
translated: As for the elimination of discrimination, it means that in this [realm] there is nothing at all to be eliminated.

original: 何以故？
analyzed: 何以故？
translated: Why is it so?

original: 善勇猛！
analyzed: 善勇猛！
translated: Good and courageous one!

original: 由無所有、虛妄、分別異分別力發起顛倒，彼寂靜故顛倒亦無，顛倒無故都無所斷。
analyzed: 由無所有、虛妄、分別異分別力發起顛倒，彼寂靜故顛倒亦無，顛倒無故都無所斷。
translated: Because of the power of non-existence, falsehood, discrimination, and different discriminations giving rise to reversals, when they are tranquil, reversals also do not exist. Because of the absence of reversals, there is absolutely nothing to be eliminated.

original: 善勇猛！
analyzed: 善勇猛！
translated: Good and courageous one!

original: 無所斷者當知顯示苦斷增語，謂於此中無少苦斷故名苦斷。
analyzed: 無所斷者當知顯示苦斷增語，謂於此中無少苦斷故名苦斷。
translated: Know that the expression elimination of suffering indicates the increase in words about the elimination of suffering, which means that in this [realm] there is no small amount of suffering to be eliminated, and therefore it is called the elimination of suffering.

original: 若苦自性少有真實可有所斷，然苦自性無少真實故無所斷，但見苦無說名苦斷，謂遍知苦都無自性少分可得故名苦斷。
analyzed: 若苦自性少有真實可有所斷，然苦自性無少真實故無所斷，但見苦無說名苦斷，謂遍知苦都無自性少分可得故名苦斷。
translated: If the intrinsic nature of suffering had even a little reality that could be eliminated, but because the intrinsic nature of suffering has not even a little reality, there is nothing to be eliminated. It is only the view of the non-existence of suffering that is called the elimination of suffering, which means that because the intrinsic nature of suffering is completely known to be unobtainable in even the slightest way, it is called the elimination of suffering.

original: 諸有於苦都無分別、無異分別名苦寂靜，即是令苦不生起義。
analyzed: 諸有於苦都無分別、無異分別名苦寂靜，即是令苦不生起義。
translated: Those who have no discrimination or different discriminations regarding suffering are said to have the tranquility of suffering, which is the meaning of causing suffering not to arise.

original: 善勇猛！
analyzed: 善勇猛！
translated: Good and courageous one!

original: 若諸菩薩能如是見，則於諸法不起分別、無異分別。
analyzed: 若諸菩薩能如是見，則於諸法不起分別、無異分別。
translated: If bodhisattvas can see in this way, then they will not give rise to discrimination or different discriminations regarding all dharmas.

original: 善勇猛！
analyzed: 善勇猛！
translated: Good at mental application!

original: 是名菩薩遍知分別、異分別性，修行般若波羅蜜多。
analyzed: 是名菩薩遍知分別、異分別性，修行般若波羅蜜多。
translated: This is called the bodhisattvas' thorough knowledge of the nature of discrimination and different discriminations, and the practice of the perfection of wisdom.

original: 「善勇猛！
analyzed: 「善勇猛！
translated: Good at mental application!

original: 若諸菩薩能如是行、能如是住，修行般若波羅蜜多速得圓滿，一切惡魔不能障礙，諸魔軍眾所起事業皆能覺知，諸有所為不隨魔事自在而轉，令諸惡魔自然退散，摧彼軍眾令其漸少，身意泰然離諸怖畏，惡魔軍眾不能擾惱。
analyzed: 若諸菩薩能如是行、能如是住，修行般若波羅蜜多速得圓滿，一切惡魔不能障礙，諸魔軍眾所起事業皆能覺知，諸有所為不隨魔事自在而轉，令諸惡魔自然退散，摧彼軍眾令其漸少，身意泰然離諸怖畏，惡魔軍眾不能擾惱。
translated: If bodhisattvas can practice in this way and abide in this way, the practice of the perfection of wisdom will quickly be fulfilled. All evil māras will not be able to obstruct them. They will be able to perceive all the activities instigated by the māra hordes. In all their endeavors, they will not be controlled by the māra affairs and will naturally cause the evil māras to retreat and scatter. They will crush the māra hordes, causing them to gradually diminish. Their bodies and minds will be at ease, free from all fear, and the evil māra hordes will not be able to disturb them.

original: 止息一切往惡趣因，斷塞世間眾邪逕路。
analyzed: 止息一切往惡趣因，斷塞世間眾邪逕路。
translated: They will put an end to all the causes for going to evil destinies and block the many wrong paths in the world.

original: 離諸黑闇，越渡瀑流，於一切法得清淨眼。
analyzed: 離諸黑闇，越渡瀑流，於一切法得清淨眼。
translated: Free from all darkness, they will cross over the turbulent currents and attain the pure eye of all dharmas.

original: 與有情類作大光明，紹隆佛種令不斷絕。
analyzed: 與有情類作大光明，紹隆佛種令不斷絕。
translated: They become a great light for sentient beings, continuing the Buddha's lineage and preventing its extinction.

original: 證得真道道平等性，哀愍有情起淨法眼；
analyzed: 證得真道道平等性，哀愍有情起淨法眼；
translated: They realize the true path and the equality of the path, and with compassion for sentient beings, they give rise to the pure Dharma eye;

original: 具足精進離諸懈怠，獲得安忍遠忿恚心，入勝靜慮無所依止，得真般若成通達慧，遣除惡作遠離蓋纏，出惡魔羂斷諸愛網，安住正念無所忘失。
analyzed: 具足精進離諸懈怠，獲得安忍遠忿恚心，入勝靜慮無所依止，得真般若成通達慧，遣除惡作遠離蓋纏，出惡魔羂斷諸愛網，安住正念無所忘失。
translated: They are fully endowed with diligence and free from laziness, they attain patient acceptance and are far from thoughts of anger, they enter excellent meditative absorption without any basis, they attain true wisdom and accomplish penetrating insight, they dispel regret and are far from the entanglements of hindrances, they emerge from the evil demon's snares and sever the nets of craving, they abide in right mindfulness without any forgetfulness.

original: 得淨尸羅至淨戒岸。
analyzed: 得淨尸羅至淨戒岸。
translated: They attain pure precepts and reach the shore of pure precepts.

original: 安住功德離諸過患。
analyzed: 安住功德離諸過患。
translated: They abide in merit and are free from faults.

original: 得定慧力不可動搖，一切他論不能摧伏。
analyzed: 得定慧力不可動搖，一切他論不能摧伏。
translated: They attain the power of concentration and wisdom that cannot be shaken, and all other teachings cannot subdue them.

original: 得諸法淨永無退失，宣說諸法得無所畏。
analyzed: 得諸法淨永無退失，宣說諸法得無所畏。
translated: They attain the purity of all dharmas and are never lost, and they proclaim the Dharma with fearlessness.

original: 入諸大眾心無怯弱，施諸妙法無所秘悋。
analyzed: 入諸大眾心無怯弱，施諸妙法無所秘悋。
translated: They enter the great assemblies without any timidity, and they bestow the wondrous Dharma without any secrecy or stinginess.

original: 以平等道淨諸道路，誓離邪道修所應修。
analyzed: 以平等道淨諸道路，誓離邪道修所應修。
translated: With the equal path, they purify all paths, and they vow to abandon the wrong paths and cultivate what should be cultivated.

original: 以清淨法熏所應熏，以清淨慧淨所應淨。
analyzed: 以清淨法熏所應熏，以清淨慧淨所應淨。
translated: With pure dharmas, they perfume what should be perfumed, and with pure wisdom, they purify what should be purified.

original: 器度深廣猶如大海，湛然不動難可測量，法海無邊過諸數量。
analyzed: 器度深廣猶如大海，湛然不動難可測量，法海無邊過諸數量。
translated: Their capacity and depth are vast like the great ocean, still and unmoving, difficult to fathom, and the ocean of Dharma is boundless, surpassing all measurements.

original: 善勇猛！
analyzed: 善勇猛！
translated: Good and Brave One!

original: 若諸菩薩能如是行，成此及餘無邊功德，如是功德難測其岸，除佛世尊無能知者。
analyzed: 若諸菩薩能如是行，成此及餘無邊功德，如是功德難測其岸，除佛世尊無能知者。
translated: If bodhisattvas are able to practice like this, they will accomplish these and other boundless merits. Such merits are difficult to fathom their limits. Except for the World-Honored Buddha, no one can know them.

original: 「復次，善勇猛！
analyzed: 「復次，善勇猛！
translated: Furthermore, Good and Brave One!

original: 菩薩如是修行般若波羅蜜多，妙色無減，財位無減，眷屬無減，種類無減，家族無減，國土無減；
analyzed: 菩薩如是修行般若波羅蜜多，妙色無減，財位無減，眷屬無減，種類無減，家族無減，國土無減；
translated: If bodhisattvas practice prajñā-pāramitā like this, their wonderful appearance will not diminish, their wealth and status will not diminish, their retinue will not diminish, their kind will not diminish, their family will not diminish, their country will not diminish;

original: 不生邊地，不遇無暇，不與穢惡有情共居，亦不隣近不淨事業；
analyzed: 不生邊地，不遇無暇，不與穢惡有情共居，亦不隣近不淨事業；
translated: They will not be born in border regions, will not encounter unfavorable conditions, will not live with defiled and evil beings, and will also not be close to impure activities;

original: 自心無退，智慧無減；
analyzed: 自心無退，智慧無減；
translated: Their own minds will not regress, and their wisdom will not diminish;

original: 從他聽受種種法門，皆能會入平等法性；
analyzed: 從他聽受種種法門，皆能會入平等法性；
translated: They listen to and accept various Dharma gates from others, and are all able to enter into the equal nature of dharmas;

original: 紹隆佛種一切智智，令常興盛無有斷絕；
analyzed: 紹隆佛種一切智智，令常興盛無有斷絕；
translated: They perpetuate the Buddha's lineage and the wisdom of omniscience, causing it to always flourish without interruption;

original: 於諸佛法已得光明，已得隣近一切智智。
analyzed: 於諸佛法已得光明，已得隣近一切智智。
translated: They have attained the light of the Buddha's teachings and have attained proximity to the wisdom of omniscience.

original: 若有惡魔來至其所欲為惱亂，則令彼魔及諸眷屬皆成灰燼，辯才頓喪羂網俱絕；
analyzed: 若有惡魔來至其所欲為惱亂，則令彼魔及諸眷屬皆成灰燼，辯才頓喪羂網俱絕；
translated: If an evil māra comes to their place and wishes to disturb them, it will cause that māra and his retinue to all become ashes, their eloquence suddenly lost and their nets all severed;

original: 假使俱胝魔及軍眾俱來嬈惱，心不動搖。
analyzed: 假使俱胝魔及軍眾俱來嬈惱，心不動搖。
translated: Even if koṭis of māras and their armies all come to harass them, their minds will not waver.

original: 於是惡魔及諸軍眾驚怖退散，作是念言：
analyzed: 於是惡魔及諸軍眾驚怖退散，作是念言：
translated: Then the evil māras and their armies will be frightened and scatter, thinking this thought:

original: 『今此菩薩已超我境，彼於我境不復當行、不復當住、不復耽著，令餘有情於我境界皆得出離蕭然解脫。
analyzed: 『今此菩薩已超我境，彼於我境不復當行、不復當住、不復耽著，令餘有情於我境界皆得出離蕭然解脫。
translated: Now this bodhisattva has surpassed my realm. He will no longer act or abide in my realm, nor will he become attached to it, causing other sentient beings to all escape from my realm and attain liberation.

original: 』時，諸惡魔作是念已，愁憂悲歎共相謂言：
analyzed: 』時，諸惡魔作是念已，愁憂悲歎共相謂言：
translated: When the evil māras have had this thought, they will be sorrowful and lament to each other, saying:

original: 『今此菩薩損我等輩眷屬、朋黨，令無勢力。
analyzed: 『今此菩薩損我等輩眷屬、朋黨，令無勢力。
translated: 'Now this bodhisattva has harmed our retinue and companions, depriving us of power.

original: 』言已各生憂苦悔恨。
analyzed: 』言已各生憂苦悔恨。
translated: ' Having said this, each gave rise to sorrow, regret, and remorse.

original: 「復次，善勇猛！
analyzed: 「復次，善勇猛！
translated: Furthermore, Subhūti!

original: 若時菩薩行深般若波羅蜜多，修深般若波羅蜜多，會深般若波羅蜜多。
analyzed: 若時菩薩行深般若波羅蜜多，修深般若波羅蜜多，會深般若波羅蜜多。
translated: When a bodhisattva practices the profound prajñā-pāramitā, cultivates the profound prajñā-pāramitā, and unifies with the profound prajñā-pāramitā,

original: 時，魔宮殿皆失威光，處處漸生煙焰之相，惡魔驚怖愁憂苦惱，如刀傷心、如中毒箭，咸共傷歎作如是言：
analyzed: 時，魔宮殿皆失威光，處處漸生煙焰之相，惡魔驚怖愁憂苦惱，如刀傷心、如中毒箭，咸共傷歎作如是言：
translated: at that time the palace of Māra loses its majestic radiance, and everywhere gradually gives rise to the appearance of smoke and flames. The evil Māra becomes frightened, sorrowful, and distressed, like being wounded by a knife or poisoned by an arrow. They all lament and say such words:

original: 『今此菩薩當令有情不受我等之所徵發，今此
analyzed: 『今此菩薩當令有情不受我等之所徵發，今此
translated: 'Now this bodhisattva will cause sentient beings not to experience what we inflict upon them. Now this

original: 菩薩當令有情出我等境，今此菩薩當令有情脫
analyzed: 菩薩當令有情出我等境，今此菩薩當令有情脫
translated: bodhisattva will cause sentient beings to leave our realm. Now this bodhisattva will cause sentient beings to escape from

original: 我等界，今此菩薩當令有情不住我境，今此菩
analyzed: 我等界，今此菩薩當令有情不住我境，今此菩
translated: our realm. Now this bodhisattva will cause sentient beings not to dwell in our realm. Now this bodhisattva

original: 薩當令有情斷滅我界，今此菩薩當令有情毀我
analyzed: 薩當令有情斷滅我界，今此菩薩當令有情毀我
translated: Sarva will cause sentient beings to destroy the realm of self. Now this bodhisattva will cause sentient beings to destroy the net of self.

original: 羂網，今此菩薩當拔有情令其永出諸欲淤泥，🔽今此菩薩當令有情脫諸見網，今此菩薩當令有
analyzed: 羂網，今此菩薩當拔有情令其永出諸欲淤泥， 今此菩薩當令有情脫諸見網，今此菩薩當令有
translated: Now this bodhisattva will pull out sentient beings and cause them to forever emerge from the mire of desires,🔽Now this bodhisattva will cause sentient beings to escape from the net of views. Now this bodhisattva will cause sentient beings to emerge from the wrong paths covered by veils. Now

original: 情出蓋邪路，今此菩薩安立有情令住正道，今
analyzed: 情出蓋邪路，今此菩薩安立有情令住正道，今
translated: this bodhisattva will establish sentient beings and cause them to abide in the right path. Now

original: 此菩薩引諸有情令其永出諸見稠林。
analyzed: 此菩薩引諸有情令其永出諸見稠林。
translated: this bodhisattva will lead sentient beings and cause them to forever emerge from the thickets of views.'

original: 』「善勇猛！
analyzed: 』「善勇猛！
translated: Subhūti!

original: 彼諸惡魔見此菩薩有如是等諸勝義利，愁憂苦惱如箭入心。
analyzed: 彼諸惡魔見此菩薩有如是等諸勝義利，愁憂苦惱如箭入心。
translated: Those evil māras, seeing this bodhisattva with such supreme benefits, are sorrowful, suffering, and distressed, as if an arrow had pierced their hearts.

original: 譬如有人失大寶藏，成就廣大愁憂苦惱；
analyzed: 譬如有人失大寶藏，成就廣大愁憂苦惱；
translated: It is like a person who has lost a great treasure, accomplishing vast sorrow, suffering, and distress;

original: 如是惡魔深心悔恨，如中毒箭愁憂苦惱，晝夜驚惶不樂本座。
analyzed: 如是惡魔深心悔恨，如中毒箭愁憂苦惱，晝夜驚惶不樂本座。
translated: In the same way, the evil māras deeply regret and are sorrowful, suffering, and distressed, like being poisoned by an arrow, alarmed day and night, not enjoying their original seats.

original: 「復次，善勇猛！
analyzed: 「復次，善勇猛！
translated: Furthermore, Subhūti!

original: 若時菩薩行深般若波羅蜜多，修深般若波羅蜜多，會深般若波羅蜜多。
analyzed: 若時菩薩行深般若波羅蜜多，修深般若波羅蜜多，會深般若波羅蜜多。
translated: When a bodhisattva practices profound prajñā-pāramitā, cultivates profound prajñā-pāramitā, and unifies with profound prajñā-pāramitā,

original: 時，諸惡魔共集一處，思惟方便欲壞菩薩，互相謂言：
analyzed: 時，諸惡魔共集一處，思惟方便欲壞菩薩，互相謂言：
translated: at that time, all evil māras gather together in one place, contemplate expedient means, and wish to destroy the bodhisattva. They say to each other:

original: 『我等今者當設何計、作何事業壞此菩薩所修正行？
analyzed: 『我等今者當設何計、作何事業壞此菩薩所修正行？
translated: What strategy should we devise now, and what work should we do to destroy the correct practice cultivated by this bodhisattva?

original: 』時，惡魔眾心懷疑惑，愁憂不樂如中毒箭，共相勸勵往菩薩所，伺求其短現怖畏事。
analyzed: 』時，惡魔眾心懷疑惑，愁憂不樂如中毒箭，共相勸勵往菩薩所，伺求其短現怖畏事。
translated: At that time, the assembly of evil māras is filled with doubt, and is sorrowful and unhappy, like being poisoned by an arrow. They encourage each other to go to the place of the bodhisattva, wait for an opportunity to seek out his shortcomings, and manifest fearful events.

original: 由此菩薩修行般若波羅蜜多威神力故，諸惡魔眾盡其神力，尚不能動菩薩毛端，況令菩薩身心變異。
analyzed: 由此菩薩修行般若波羅蜜多威神力故，諸惡魔眾盡其神力，尚不能動菩薩毛端，況令菩薩身心變異。
translated: Because of the majestic power of this bodhisattva's practice of prajñā-pāramitā, even if the assembly of evil māras exhausts their spiritual power, they will still be unable to move even a single hair of the bodhisattva, let alone cause the bodhisattva's body and mind to change.

original: 時，諸惡魔覺知菩薩遠離驚恐、毛竪等事，更設方便種種魅惑，心神俱劣懷怖畏故，諸魅惑事皆不能成。
analyzed: 時，諸惡魔覺知菩薩遠離驚恐、毛竪等事，更設方便種種魅惑，心神俱劣懷怖畏故，諸魅惑事皆不能成。
translated: At that time, the evil māras realize that the bodhisattvas are far removed from fear, horripilation, and other such things, and they devise various means to enchant them. However, because their minds are weak and fearful, none of their enchanting methods succeed.

original: 時，惡魔王便作是念：
analyzed: 時，惡魔王便作是念：
translated: At that time, the evil māra king thinks like this:

original: 『我尚不能壞此菩薩，況我眷屬或餘能壞！
analyzed: 『我尚不能壞此菩薩，況我眷屬或餘能壞！
translated: I am still unable to destroy this bodhisattva, let alone my retinue or others being able to destroy him!

original: 』念已驚怖力盡計窮，還歸自宮愁憂而住。
analyzed: 』念已驚怖力盡計窮，還歸自宮愁憂而住。
translated: Having thought this, he is frightened, his power exhausted and his plans exhausted. He returns to his own palace and dwells there in sorrow and worry.

original: 如是菩薩修行般若波羅蜜多具大威力，惡魔眷屬尚不能令如彈指頃心有迷惑，何況能為餘障礙事！
analyzed: 如是菩薩修行般若波羅蜜多具大威力，惡魔眷屬尚不能令如彈指頃心有迷惑，何況能為餘障礙事！
translated: In this way, the bodhisattva who practices prajñā-pāramitā possesses great power. The evil māras and their retinue are still unable to cause his mind to be confused for even the duration of a finger snap, let alone be able to create other obstacles.

original: 「善勇猛！
analyzed: 「善勇猛！
translated: Good at Vigor!

original: 如是菩薩修行般若波羅蜜多，成就如是功德智慧大威神力。
analyzed: 如是菩薩修行般若波羅蜜多，成就如是功德智慧大威神力。
translated: In this way, the bodhisattva who practices prajñā-pāramitā accomplishes such merits, wisdom, and greatly powerful spiritual abilities.

original: 假使三千大千世界諸有情類皆變為魔，一一皆將爾所魔眾，為擾亂故往菩薩所，盡其神力亦不能障所修般若波羅蜜多。
analyzed: 假使三千大千世界諸有情類皆變為魔，一一皆將爾所魔眾，為擾亂故往菩薩所，盡其神力亦不能障所修般若波羅蜜多。
translated: Even if all sentient beings in the trichiliocosm were to transform into Māra, with each Māra leading that many hordes of Māra to the bodhisattva's place in order to disturb him, they would still be unable to obstruct the bodhisattva's cultivation of prajñā-pāramitā with all their spiritual powers.

original: 何以故？
analyzed: 何以故？
translated: Why is this?

original: 善勇猛！
analyzed: 善勇猛！
translated: Good and brave one!

original: 爾時，菩薩成就如是甚深般若刀劍力故，亦復成就不可思議、不可測量及無等等般若力故，不為一切暴惡魔軍之所降伏。
analyzed: 爾時，菩薩成就如是甚深般若刀劍力故，亦復成就不可思議、不可測量及無等等般若力故，不為一切暴惡魔軍之所降伏。
translated: At that time, the bodhisattva, having accomplished such a profound sword-like power of prajñā, also accomplishes an inconceivable, immeasurable, and unequaled power of prajñā, and is not subdued by any violent and evil Māra armies.

original: 善勇猛！🔽夫大刀者，謂般若刀；
analyzed: 善勇猛！ 夫大刀者，謂般若刀；
translated: Good and brave one!🔽The great sword is the sword of prajñā;

original: 夫大劍者，謂般若劍；
analyzed: 夫大劍者，謂般若劍；
translated: The great sword is the sword of prajñā;

original: 夫大力者，謂般若力。
analyzed: 夫大力者，謂般若力。
translated: The great power is the power of prajñā.

original: 是故般若波羅蜜多非諸惡魔所行境地。
analyzed: 是故般若波羅蜜多非諸惡魔所行境地。
translated: Therefore, prajñā-pāramitā is not the realm of activity for any evil Māra.

original: 「復次，善勇猛！
analyzed: 「復次，善勇猛！
translated: Furthermore, good and brave one!

original: 諸有外仙得四靜慮、四無色定，超欲魔境生諸梵天、四無色地。
analyzed: 諸有外仙得四靜慮、四無色定，超欲魔境生諸梵天、四無色地。
translated: The non-Buddhist sages who attain the four meditations and four formless concentrations transcend the realm of desire and Māra, and are born in the Brahmā heavens and the four formless realms.

original: 彼於菩薩常所成就世間妙慧尚非行境，況實般若波羅蜜多！
analyzed: 彼於菩薩常所成就世間妙慧尚非行境，況實般若波羅蜜多！
translated: Even the mundane wisdom that the bodhisattvas always accomplish is not their domain, let alone the true prajñā-pāramitā!

original: 何況惡魔能行此境！
analyzed: 何況惡魔能行此境！
translated: How much less could the evil Māra practice this domain!

original: 彼於獲得色、無色定外仙妙慧尚非行境，況於般若波羅蜜多！
analyzed: 彼於獲得色、無色定外仙妙慧尚非行境，況於般若波羅蜜多！
translated: They are not even in the domain of the non-Buddhist sages who attain the wisdom of the meditations and formless concentrations, let alone prajñā-pāramitā!

original: 善勇猛！
analyzed: 善勇猛！
translated: Good son!

original: 若時菩薩成就般若波羅蜜多，爾時菩薩名為成就大威力者；🔽若有成就般若威力，即名成就利慧刀者；
analyzed: 若時菩薩成就般若波羅蜜多，爾時菩薩名為成就大威力者； 若有成就般若威力，即名成就利慧刀者；
translated: When a bodhisattva accomplishes prajñā-pāramitā, at that time the bodhisattva is called one who has accomplished great power;🔽If one has accomplished the power of prajñā, one is called one who has accomplished the sharp sword of wisdom;

original: 若有成就般若利刀，即名成就利慧劍者。
analyzed: 若有成就般若利刀，即名成就利慧劍者。
translated: If one has accomplished the sharpness of prajñā, one is called one who has accomplished the sharp sword of wisdom.

original: 諸惡魔軍不能降伏，而能降伏一切魔軍。
analyzed: 諸惡魔軍不能降伏，而能降伏一切魔軍。
translated: The armies of evil Māras cannot subdue them, but they can subdue all Māra's armies.

original: 「復次，善勇猛！
analyzed: 「復次，善勇猛！
translated: Furthermore, good son!

original: 若諸菩薩成就般若波羅蜜多利慧刀劍具大勢力，是諸菩薩於一切處無所依止，諸有所作亦無所依。
analyzed: 若諸菩薩成就般若波羅蜜多利慧刀劍具大勢力，是諸菩薩於一切處無所依止，諸有所作亦無所依。
translated: If bodhisattvas accomplish the sharp sword of the perfection of wisdom and possess great power, these bodhisattvas have no basis in any place, and whatever they do is also without basis.

original: 何以故？
analyzed: 何以故？
translated: Why is it so?

original: 善勇猛！
analyzed: 善勇猛！
translated: Subhūti!

original: 若有所依則有移轉，若有移轉則有動搖，若有動搖則有戲論。
analyzed: 若有所依則有移轉，若有移轉則有動搖，若有動搖則有戲論。
translated: If there is a basis, then there is movement. If there is movement, then there is agitation. If there is agitation, then there is conceptual proliferation.

original: 善勇猛！
analyzed: 善勇猛！
translated: Subhūti!

original: 若諸有情有依、有轉動搖戲論，是諸有情隨魔力行未脫魔境。
analyzed: 若諸有情有依、有轉動搖戲論，是諸有情隨魔力行未脫魔境。
translated: If sentient beings have a basis, move, are agitated, and conceptually proliferate, then these sentient beings follow the power of Māra and have not escaped the realm of Māra.

original: 善勇猛！
analyzed: 善勇猛！
translated: Subhūti!

original: 若諸有情雖復乃至上生有頂有所依止，繫屬所依依所、依處，彼必還墮魔境界中，未脫惡魔所有羂網，惡魔索縷常所隨逐。
analyzed: 若諸有情雖復乃至上生有頂有所依止，繫屬所依依所、依處，彼必還墮魔境界中，未脫惡魔所有羂網，惡魔索縷常所隨逐。
translated: If sentient beings, even if they are reborn in the highest heaven, have a basis, are bound to a basis, and depend on a place, they will certainly fall back into the realm of Māra, have not escaped the net of the evil Māra, and are always followed by the thread of the evil Māra.

original: 如猛憙子及阿邏茶迦邏摩子，并餘一切依止無色，繫屬所依依所、依處諸仙外道。
analyzed: 如猛憙子及阿邏茶迦邏摩子，并餘一切依止無色，繫屬所依依所、依處諸仙外道。
translated: Like the son of Mākandika and the son of Ārāḍa Kālāma, and all other non-Buddhist ascetics who rely on the formless realm, are bound to their support, and rely on their support and supported places.

original: 善勇猛！
analyzed: 善勇猛！
translated: Good and Brave One!

original: 若諸菩薩行深般若波羅蜜多，修深般若波羅蜜多，會深般若波羅蜜多。
analyzed: 若諸菩薩行深般若波羅蜜多，修深般若波羅蜜多，會深般若波羅蜜多。
translated: If bodhisattvas practice the profound prajñā-pāramitā, cultivate the profound prajñā-pāramitā, and realize the profound prajñā-pāramitā,

original: 是諸菩薩於一切處無所依止，諸有所作亦無所依。
analyzed: 是諸菩薩於一切處無所依止，諸有所作亦無所依。
translated: these bodhisattvas will have no support in any place, and in all their actions they will also have no support.

original: 「善勇猛！
analyzed: 「善勇猛！
translated: Good and Brave One!

original: 若諸菩薩勇猛精進修行般若波羅蜜多隨順安住，爾時菩薩不依止色，亦不依止受、想、行、識；
analyzed: 若諸菩薩勇猛精進修行般若波羅蜜多隨順安住，爾時菩薩不依止色，亦不依止受、想、行、識；
translated: If bodhisattvas vigorously strive, practice prajñā-pāramitā, and abide in accordance with it, at that time the bodhisattvas will not rely on form, nor will they rely on feeling, perception, formation, or consciousness;

original: 不依止眼，亦不依止耳、鼻、舌、身、意；
analyzed: 不依止眼，亦不依止耳、鼻、舌、身、意；
translated: they will not rely on the eye, nor will they rely on the ear, nose, tongue, body, or mind;

original: 不依止色，亦不依止聲、香、味、觸、法；
analyzed: 不依止色，亦不依止聲、香、味、觸、法；
translated: they will not rely on form, nor will they rely on sound, smell, taste, touch, or dharmas;

original: 不依止眼識，亦不依止耳、鼻、舌、身、意識；
analyzed: 不依止眼識，亦不依止耳、鼻、舌、身、意識；
translated: They do not rely on eye consciousness, nor do they rely on ear, nose, tongue, body, or mind consciousness;

original: 不依止名、色，不依止顛倒、見趣、諸蓋及諸
analyzed: 不依止名、色，不依止顛倒、見趣、諸蓋及諸
translated: They do not rely on name-and-form, nor do they rely on inverted views, entanglements,

original: 愛行，不依止緣起，不依止欲、色、無色界，
analyzed: 愛行，不依止緣起，不依止欲、色、無色界，
translated: or the various types of craving, nor do they rely on dependent origination, nor do they rely on the realms of desire, form, or formlessness;

original: 不依止我、有情、命者、生者、養者、士夫、
analyzed: 不依止我、有情、命者、生者、養者、士夫、
translated: They do not rely on the notions of self, sentient being, life, birth, nurture, person,

original: 補特伽羅、意生、儒童、作者、受者、知者、
analyzed: 補特伽羅、意生、儒童、作者、受者、知者、
translated: pudgala, mind-born, youth, doer, experiencer, knower,

original: 見者及彼諸想，不依止地、水、火、風、空、
analyzed: 見者及彼諸想，不依止地、水、火、風、空、
translated: or seer, nor do they rely on the elements of earth, water, fire, wind, space,

original: 識界，不依止有情界、法界，不依止初靜慮乃
analyzed: 識界，不依止有情界、法界，不依止初靜慮乃
translated: or consciousness, nor do they rely on the realms of sentient beings or phenomena, nor do they rely on the first meditative absorption

original: 至非想非非想處，不依止有愛，不依止無有愛
analyzed: 至非想非非想處，不依止有愛，不依止無有愛
translated: up to the sphere of neither perception nor non-perception, nor do they rely on craving for existence, nor do they rely on craving for non-existence;

original: ，不依止斷、常，不依止有性，不依止無性，
analyzed: ，不依止斷、常，不依止有性，不依止無性，
translated: They do not rely on annihilation or permanence, nor do they rely on existence, nor do they rely on non-existence,

original: 不依止布施、慳貪、持戒、犯戒、安忍、忿恚
analyzed: 不依止布施、慳貪、持戒、犯戒、安忍、忿恚
translated: not relying on generosity, stinginess, upholding precepts, violating precepts, patience, anger

original: 、精進、懈怠、靜慮、散亂、般若、惡慧，不
analyzed: 、精進、懈怠、靜慮、散亂、般若、惡慧，不
translated: , diligence, laziness, meditative concentration, distraction, wisdom, and ignorance, not

original: 依止念住、正斷、神足、根、力、覺支、道支
analyzed: 依止念住、正斷、神足、根、力、覺支、道支
translated: relying on the applications of mindfulness, right efforts, bases of supernatural powers, faculties, powers, factors of awakening, factors of the path

original: ，不依止斷顛倒等，不依止靜慮、解脫、等持
analyzed: ，不依止斷顛倒等，不依止靜慮、解脫、等持
translated: , not relying on the elimination of inverted views, etc., not relying on meditative concentration, liberation, samādhi

original: 、等至，不依止苦、集、滅、道，不依止盡智
analyzed: 、等至，不依止苦、集、滅、道，不依止盡智
translated: , attainments, not relying on suffering, its origin, cessation, and the path, not relying on the knowledge of destruction

original: 、無生智、無造作智，不依止無著智見，不依
analyzed: 、無生智、無造作智，不依止無著智見，不依
translated: , the knowledge of non-arising, the knowledge of non-action, not relying on the view of non-attached knowledge, not relying

original: 止明及解脫，不依止解脫智見，不依止異生、
analyzed: 止明及解脫，不依止解脫智見，不依止異生、
translated: on illumination and liberation, not relying on the knowledge and vision of liberation, not relying on the stages of ordinary beings,

original: 聲聞、獨覺、菩薩、佛地，不依止異生、聲聞
analyzed: 聲聞、獨覺、菩薩、佛地，不依止異生、聲聞
translated: śrāvakas, pratyekabuddhas, bodhisattvas, and buddhas, not relying on the dharmas of ordinary beings, śrāvakas

original: 、獨覺、菩薩、佛法，不依止涅槃，不依止過
analyzed: 、獨覺、菩薩、佛法，不依止涅槃，不依止過
translated: , pratyekabuddhas, bodhisattvas, and buddhas, not relying on nirvāṇa, not relying on transcendence

original: 去未來現在智見，不依止三世平等性，不依止
analyzed: 去未來現在智見，不依止三世平等性，不依止
translated: They do not rely on the cognition and insight of the past, future, and present, and do not rely on the equality of the three times,

original: 佛智、力、無畏等，不依止一切智智，不依止
analyzed: 佛智、力、無畏等，不依止一切智智，不依止
translated: They do not rely on the cognition, powers, fearlessness, etc. of the Buddha, and do not rely on the cognition of all cognition and insight,

original: 相好圓滿，不依止佛土圓滿，不依止聲聞眾圓
analyzed: 相好圓滿，不依止佛土圓滿，不依止聲聞眾圓
translated: They do not rely on the perfection of the major and minor marks, do not rely on the perfection of the Buddha land, do not rely on the perfection of the assembly of śrāvakas,

original: 滿，不依止菩薩眾圓滿，不依止一切法，不依
analyzed: 滿，不依止菩薩眾圓滿，不依止一切法，不依
translated: Do not rely on the perfection of the assembly of bodhisattvas, do not rely on all dharmas, do not rely on

original: 止移轉，不依止動搖，不依止戲論。
analyzed: 止移轉，不依止動搖，不依止戲論。
translated: change and transformation, do not rely on movement and agitation, do not rely on conceptual proliferation.

original: 由無依止除遣一切，亦不執著無依止道，於無依止亦不恃執，亦復不得此是依止，亦復不得在此依止，亦復不得屬此依止，亦復不得依此依止，於所依止亦無恃執。
analyzed: 由無依止除遣一切，亦不執著無依止道，於無依止亦不恃執，亦復不得此是依止，亦復不得在此依止，亦復不得屬此依止，亦復不得依此依止，於所依止亦無恃執。
translated: Because of non-reliance, all are eliminated and dispelled. They do not even cling to the path of non-reliance. They do not even grasp and cling to non-reliance. They also do not attain this is reliance, they also do not attain abiding in this reliance, they also do not attain belonging to this reliance, they also do not attain relying on this reliance. They have no grasping and clinging to the relied upon.

original: 如是菩薩於諸依止，無恃無得，無執無取，無說無欣，無著而住，不為一切依止所染，於諸依止亦無滯礙，證得一切依止淨法。
analyzed: 如是菩薩於諸依止，無恃無得，無執無取，無說無欣，無著而住，不為一切依止所染，於諸依止亦無滯礙，證得一切依止淨法。
translated: In this way, bodhisattvas have no reliance, no attainment, no grasping, no fixation, no attachment, no dwelling, and are not tainted by any reliance. They are also unhindered by any reliance and realize the pure Dharma of all reliance.

original: 「善勇猛！
analyzed: 「善勇猛！
translated: Good son!

original: 此諸菩薩依一切法，依止清淨微妙智見，修行般若波羅蜜多，由此惡魔不能得便，惡魔軍眾不能降伏，而能降伏一切魔軍。
analyzed: 此諸菩薩依一切法，依止清淨微妙智見，修行般若波羅蜜多，由此惡魔不能得便，惡魔軍眾不能降伏，而能降伏一切魔軍。
translated: These bodhisattvas rely on all dharmas, relying on the pure and subtle wisdom-insight to cultivate prajñā-pāramitā. For this reason, evil māras cannot take advantage of them, the hordes of evil māras cannot subdue them, and they are able to subdue all māra armies.

original: 「復次，善勇猛！
analyzed: 「復次，善勇猛！
translated: Furthermore, good son!

original: 若諸菩薩未發無上正等覺心，先應積集無量無數善根資糧，多供養佛、事多善友，於多佛所請問法要，發弘誓願意樂具足，於諸有情樂行布施，於清淨戒尊重護持，忍辱柔和悉皆具足，勇猛精進離諸懈怠，尊重修行鮮白靜慮，於清淨慧恭敬修學。
analyzed: 若諸菩薩未發無上正等覺心，先應積集無量無數善根資糧，多供養佛、事多善友，於多佛所請問法要，發弘誓願意樂具足，於諸有情樂行布施，於清淨戒尊重護持，忍辱柔和悉皆具足，勇猛精進離諸懈怠，尊重修行鮮白靜慮，於清淨慧恭敬修學。
translated: If bodhisattvas have not yet given rise to the mind of unsurpassed perfect enlightenment, they should first accumulate immeasurable and innumerable provisions of wholesome roots, make offerings to many buddhas, serve many good friends, ask about the essentials of the Dharma in the presence of many buddhas, give rise to great vows and be replete with aspiration, happily practice giving to sentient beings, greatly respect and uphold pure precepts, be replete with patience and gentleness, be vigorous and energetic, free from laziness, greatly respect and practice pure meditative absorption, and respectfully study and cultivate pure wisdom.

original: 是諸菩薩既發無上正等覺心，復應精勤修學般若波羅蜜多，以智慧力伏諸魔眾。
analyzed: 是諸菩薩既發無上正等覺心，復應精勤修學般若波羅蜜多，以智慧力伏諸魔眾。
translated: These bodhisattvas, having already given rise to the mind of unsurpassed perfect enlightenment, should further diligently study prajñā-pāramitā, and with the power of wisdom subdue the hosts of māras.

original: 恒作是念：
analyzed: 恒作是念：
translated: They should always think like this:

original: 『勿為惡魔伺求我短作擾亂事。
analyzed: 『勿為惡魔伺求我短作擾亂事。
translated: Do not let evil māras seek out my shortcomings and create disturbances.

original: 』由斯力故，令諸惡魔不能得便障所修學，亦令魔眾不起是心：
analyzed: 』由斯力故，令諸惡魔不能得便障所修學，亦令魔眾不起是心：
translated: By this power, they will prevent evil māras from finding an opportunity to obstruct their studies, and also prevent the māra hordes from giving rise to the thought:

original: 『我當伺求此菩薩便，為擾亂事障礙所修。
analyzed: 『我當伺求此菩薩便，為擾亂事障礙所修。
translated: 'I will wait for an opportunity to create disturbances and obstacles for this bodhisattva's practice.'

original: 』設起是心即令自覺：
analyzed: 』設起是心即令自覺：
translated: If such a thought arises, they will immediately realize:

original: 『我作斯事必遭大苦。
analyzed: 『我作斯事必遭大苦。
translated: 'If I do this, I will certainly encounter great suffering.'

original: 』由斯發起大恐怖心：
analyzed: 』由斯發起大恐怖心：
translated: Because of this, they will give rise to a greatly terrified mind:

original: 『勿我今時喪失身命故，應息此擾亂之心。
analyzed: 『勿我今時喪失身命故，應息此擾亂之心。
translated: 'Do not let me now lose my life and body, therefore I should put an end to this disturbed mind.'

original: 』於是魔軍惡心隱沒。
analyzed: 』於是魔軍惡心隱沒。
translated: Then the evil army of Mara will disappear.

original: 善勇猛！
analyzed: 善勇猛！
translated: Good and Brave One!

original: 由此因緣，惡魔軍眾不能障礙菩薩所學甚深般若波羅蜜多。
analyzed: 由此因緣，惡魔軍眾不能障礙菩薩所學甚深般若波羅蜜多。
translated: For this reason, the evil army of Mara will not be able to obstruct the bodhisattvas' study of the profound prajnaparamita.

original: 「復次，善勇猛！
analyzed: 「復次，善勇猛！
translated: Furthermore, Good and Brave One!

original: 若諸菩薩聞說般若波羅蜜多，起純淨欲增上意樂，深心尊重，稱讚功德，起大師想；
analyzed: 若諸菩薩聞說般若波羅蜜多，起純淨欲增上意樂，深心尊重，稱讚功德，起大師想；
translated: If bodhisattvas hear the teaching of prajnaparamita, they will give rise to pure desire and superior intention, deeply respect and praise its merits, and give rise to the thought of the great teacher;

original: 聞說六種波羅蜜多相應法教，亦不發起猶豫疑惑；
analyzed: 聞說六種波羅蜜多相應法教，亦不發起猶豫疑惑；
translated: Having heard the teachings associated with the six paramitas, they will also not give rise to doubt or confusion;

original: 聞甚深法心不迷謬，亦復不起猶豫疑惑；
analyzed: 聞甚深法心不迷謬，亦復不起猶豫疑惑；
translated: Hearing the profound Dharma, their minds are not confused or deluded, and they also do not give rise to doubt or uncertainty;

original: 終不造作感匱法業，亦不發起感匱法心；
analyzed: 終不造作感匱法業，亦不發起感匱法心；
translated: They never create karma that leads to lack of the Dharma, nor do they give rise to a mind that leads to lack of the Dharma;

original: 勸導無量無邊有情，信受修學甚深般若波羅蜜多；
analyzed: 勸導無量無邊有情，信受修學甚深般若波羅蜜多；
translated: They encourage countless, limitless sentient beings to have faith and accept the practice of the profound prajñā-pāramitā;

original: 讚勵無量無邊有情，亦令信受修學六種波羅蜜多。
analyzed: 讚勵無量無邊有情，亦令信受修學六種波羅蜜多。
translated: They exhort and encourage countless, limitless sentient beings to also have faith and accept the practice of the six kinds of pāramitās.

original: 是諸菩薩先意樂淨，一切意樂皆無雜染，諸惡魔軍不能障礙，伺求其便亦不能得，眾魔事業皆能覺知，一切惡魔不能引奪，不隨魔力自在而行。
analyzed: 是諸菩薩先意樂淨，一切意樂皆無雜染，諸惡魔軍不能障礙，伺求其便亦不能得，眾魔事業皆能覺知，一切惡魔不能引奪，不隨魔力自在而行。
translated: These bodhisattvas first purify their intention, and all their intentions are free from defilement. The evil māra armies are unable to obstruct them. Even if they seek an opportunity, they are unable to find one. They are able to be aware of all the activities of the māras. All the evil māras are unable to lead them astray. They do not act under the power and control of the māras.

original: 善勇猛！
analyzed: 善勇猛！
translated: Good son!

original: 由此因緣，是諸菩薩惡魔眷屬不能擾亂。
analyzed: 由此因緣，是諸菩薩惡魔眷屬不能擾亂。
translated: For this reason, these bodhisattvas cannot be disturbed by the retinue of the evil māras.

original: 「復次，善勇猛！
analyzed: 「復次，善勇猛！
translated: Furthermore, good son!

original: 若諸菩薩修行般若波羅蜜多，不行色合相，不行色離相，不行受、想、行、識合相，不行受、想、行、識離相；
analyzed: 若諸菩薩修行般若波羅蜜多，不行色合相，不行色離相，不行受、想、行、識合相，不行受、想、行、識離相；
translated: If bodhisattvas practice prajñā-pāramitā, they do not practice the combined characteristics of form, nor do they practice the separated characteristics of form; they do not practice the combined characteristics of feeling, perception, formation, or consciousness, nor do they practice the separated characteristics of feeling, perception, formation, or consciousness;

original: 不行眼合相，不行眼離相，不行耳、鼻、舌、身、意合相，不行耳、鼻、舌、身、意離相；
analyzed: 不行眼合相，不行眼離相，不行耳、鼻、舌、身、意合相，不行耳、鼻、舌、身、意離相；
translated: they do not practice the combined characteristics of the eye, nor do they practice the separated characteristics of the eye; they do not practice the combined characteristics of the ear, nose, tongue, body, or mind, nor do they practice the separated characteristics of the ear, nose, tongue, body, or mind;

original: 不行色合相，不行色離相，不行聲、香、味、觸、法合相，不行聲、香、味、觸、法離相；
analyzed: 不行色合相，不行色離相，不行聲、香、味、觸、法合相，不行聲、香、味、觸、法離相；
translated: they do not practice the combined characteristics of form, nor do they practice the separated characteristics of form; they do not practice the combined characteristics of sound, smell, taste, touch, or dharmas, nor do they practice the separated characteristics of sound, smell, taste, touch, or dharmas;

original: 不行眼識合相，不行眼識離相，不行耳、鼻、舌、身、意識合相，不行耳、鼻、舌、身、意識離相；
analyzed: 不行眼識合相，不行眼識離相，不行耳、鼻、舌、身、意識合相，不行耳、鼻、舌、身、意識離相；
translated: they do not practice the combined characteristics of eye consciousness, nor do they practice the separated characteristics of eye consciousness; they do not practice the combined characteristics of ear, nose, tongue, body, or mind consciousness, nor do they practice the separated characteristics of ear, nose, tongue, body, or mind consciousness;

original: 不行色相合、離相，不行受、想、行、識相合、離相；
analyzed: 不行色相合、離相，不行受、想、行、識相合、離相；
translated: They do not engage in the characteristics of form being united or separated, nor do they engage in the characteristics of feeling, perception, formation, or consciousness being united or separated;

original: 不行眼相合、離相，不行耳、鼻、舌、身、意相合、離相；
analyzed: 不行眼相合、離相，不行耳、鼻、舌、身、意相合、離相；
translated: They do not engage in the characteristics of the eyes being united or separated, nor do they engage in the characteristics of the ears, nose, tongue, body, or mind being united or separated;

original: 不行色相合、離相，不行聲、香、味、觸、法相合、離相；
analyzed: 不行色相合、離相，不行聲、香、味、觸、法相合、離相；
translated: They do not engage in the characteristics of form being united or separated, nor do they engage in the characteristics of sound, smell, taste, touch, or dharmas being united or separated;

original: 不行眼識相合、離相，不行耳、鼻、舌、身、意識相合、離相。
analyzed: 不行眼識相合、離相，不行耳、鼻、舌、身、意識相合、離相。
translated: They do not engage in the characteristics of eye-consciousness being united or separated, nor do they engage in the characteristics of ear-, nose-, tongue-, body-, or mind-consciousness being united or separated.

original: 「不行色清淨、不清淨相，不行受、想、行、識清淨、不清淨相；
analyzed: 「不行色清淨、不清淨相，不行受、想、行、識清淨、不清淨相；
translated: They do not engage in the characteristics of the purity or impurity of form, nor do they engage in the characteristics of the purity or impurity of feeling, perception, formation, or consciousness;

original: 不行眼清淨、不清淨相，不行耳、鼻、舌、身、意清淨、不清淨相；
analyzed: 不行眼清淨、不清淨相，不行耳、鼻、舌、身、意清淨、不清淨相；
translated: They do not engage in the characteristics of the purity or impurity of the eyes, nor do they engage in the characteristics of the purity or impurity of the ears, nose, tongue, body, or mind;

original: 不行色清淨、不清淨相，不行聲、香、味、觸、法清淨、不清淨相；
analyzed: 不行色清淨、不清淨相，不行聲、香、味、觸、法清淨、不清淨相；
translated: They do not engage in the characteristics of the purity or impurity of form, nor do they engage in the characteristics of the purity or impurity of sound, smell, taste, touch, or dharmas;

original: 不行眼識清淨、不清淨相，不行耳、鼻、舌、身、意識清淨、不清淨相；
analyzed: 不行眼識清淨、不清淨相，不行耳、鼻、舌、身、意識清淨、不清淨相；
translated: They do not engage in the characteristics of the purity and impurity of eye consciousness, nor do they engage in the characteristics of the purity and impurity of ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind consciousness;

original: 不行緣色清淨、不清淨相，不行緣受、想、行、識清淨、不清淨相；
analyzed: 不行緣色清淨、不清淨相，不行緣受、想、行、識清淨、不清淨相；
translated: They do not engage in the characteristics of the purity and impurity of conditioned by form, nor do they engage in the characteristics of the purity and impurity of conditioned by feeling, perception, mental formations, and consciousness;

original: 不行緣眼清淨、不清淨相，不行緣耳、鼻、舌、身、意清淨、不清淨相；
analyzed: 不行緣眼清淨、不清淨相，不行緣耳、鼻、舌、身、意清淨、不清淨相；
translated: They do not engage in the characteristics of the purity and impurity of conditioned by the eye, nor do they engage in the characteristics of the purity and impurity of conditioned by the ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind;

original: 不行緣色清淨、不清淨相，不行緣聲、香、味、觸、法清淨、不清淨相；
analyzed: 不行緣色清淨、不清淨相，不行緣聲、香、味、觸、法清淨、不清淨相；
translated: They do not engage in the characteristics of the purity and impurity of conditioned by form, nor do they engage in the characteristics of the purity and impurity of conditioned by sound, smell, taste, touch, and dharmas;

original: 不行緣眼識清淨、不清淨相，不行緣耳、鼻、舌、身、意識清淨、不清淨相。
analyzed: 不行緣眼識清淨、不清淨相，不行緣耳、鼻、舌、身、意識清淨、不清淨相。
translated: They do not engage in the characteristics of the purity and impurity of conditioned by eye consciousness, nor do they engage in the characteristics of the purity and impurity of conditioned by ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind consciousness.

original: 「不行起色清淨不清淨、合離相，不行起受、想、行、識清淨不清淨、合離相；
analyzed: 「不行起色清淨不清淨、合離相，不行起受、想、行、識清淨不清淨、合離相；
translated: Do not engage in the characteristics of purity and impurity, combination and separation regarding the arising of form; do not engage in the characteristics of purity and impurity, combination and separation regarding the arising of feeling, perception, mental formations, and consciousness;

original: 不行起眼清淨不清淨、合離相，不行起耳、鼻、舌、身、意清淨不清淨、合離相；
analyzed: 不行起眼清淨不清淨、合離相，不行起耳、鼻、舌、身、意清淨不清淨、合離相；
translated: Do not engage in the characteristics of purity and impurity, combination and separation regarding the arising of the eye; do not engage in the characteristics of purity and impurity, combination and separation regarding the arising of the ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind;

original: 不行起色清淨不清淨、合離相，不行起聲、香、味、觸、法清淨不清淨、合離相；
analyzed: 不行起色清淨不清淨、合離相，不行起聲、香、味、觸、法清淨不清淨、合離相；
translated: Do not engage in the characteristics of purity and impurity, combination and separation regarding the arising of form; do not engage in the characteristics of purity and impurity, combination and separation regarding the arising of sound, smell, taste, touch, and mental objects;

original: 不行起眼識清淨不清淨、合離相，不行起耳、鼻、舌、身、意識清淨不清淨、合離相。
analyzed: 不行起眼識清淨不清淨、合離相，不行起耳、鼻、舌、身、意識清淨不清淨、合離相。
translated: Do not engage in the characteristics of purity and impurity, combination and separation regarding the arising of eye-consciousness; do not engage in the characteristics of purity and impurity, combination and separation regarding the arising of ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind-consciousness.

original: 「不行緣色自性清淨不清淨、合離相，不行緣受、想、行、識自性清淨不清淨、合離相；
analyzed: 「不行緣色自性清淨不清淨、合離相，不行緣受、想、行、識自性清淨不清淨、合離相；
translated: Do not engage in the characteristics of purity and impurity, combination and separation regarding the intrinsic nature of form as a condition; do not engage in the characteristics of purity and impurity, combination and separation regarding the intrinsic nature of feeling, perception, mental formations, and consciousness as a condition;

original: 不行緣眼自性清淨不清淨、合離相，不行緣耳、鼻、舌、身、意自性清淨不清淨、合離相；
analyzed: 不行緣眼自性清淨不清淨、合離相，不行緣耳、鼻、舌、身、意自性清淨不清淨、合離相；
translated: They do not engage in the characteristics of the purity and impurity, combination and separation of the self-nature of the ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind;

original: 不行緣色自性清淨不清淨、合離相，不行緣聲、香、味、觸、法自性清淨不清淨、合離相；
analyzed: 不行緣色自性清淨不清淨、合離相，不行緣聲、香、味、觸、法自性清淨不清淨、合離相；
translated: They do not engage in the characteristics of the purity and impurity, combination and separation of the self-nature of form,

original: 不行緣眼識自性清淨不清淨、合離相，不行緣耳、鼻、舌、身、意識自性清淨不清淨、合離相。
analyzed: 不行緣眼識自性清淨不清淨、合離相，不行緣耳、鼻、舌、身、意識自性清淨不清淨、合離相。
translated: They do not engage in the characteristics of the purity and impurity, combination and separation of the self-nature of eye consciousness, ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind consciousness.

original: 「不行色本性清淨不清淨、合離相，不行受、想、行、識本性清淨不清淨、合離相；
analyzed: 「不行色本性清淨不清淨、合離相，不行受、想、行、識本性清淨不清淨、合離相；
translated: They do not engage in the characteristics of the purity and impurity, combination and separation of the intrinsic nature of form, they do not engage in the characteristics of the purity and impurity, combination and separation of the intrinsic nature of feeling, perception, formation, and consciousness;

original: 不行眼本性清淨不清淨、合離相，不行耳、鼻、舌、身、意本性清淨不清淨、合離相；
analyzed: 不行眼本性清淨不清淨、合離相，不行耳、鼻、舌、身、意本性清淨不清淨、合離相；
translated: They do not engage in the characteristic of the purity or impurity, union or separation, of the fundamental nature of the eyes; they do not engage in the characteristic of the purity or impurity, union or separation, of the fundamental nature of the ears, nose, tongue, body, or mind;

original: 不行色本性清淨不清淨、合離相，不行聲、香、味、觸、法本性清淨不清淨、合離相；
analyzed: 不行色本性清淨不清淨、合離相，不行聲、香、味、觸、法本性清淨不清淨、合離相；
translated: they do not engage in the characteristic of the purity or impurity, union or separation, of the fundamental nature of forms; they do not engage in the characteristic of the purity or impurity, union or separation, of the fundamental nature of sounds, smells, tastes, tactile objects, or dharmas;

original: 不行眼識本性清淨不清淨、合離相，不行耳、鼻、舌、身、意識本性清淨不清淨、合離相；
analyzed: 不行眼識本性清淨不清淨、合離相，不行耳、鼻、舌、身、意識本性清淨不清淨、合離相；
translated: they do not engage in the characteristic of the purity or impurity, union or separation, of the fundamental nature of eye consciousness; they do not engage in the characteristic of the purity or impurity, union or separation, of the fundamental nature of ear, nose, tongue, body, or mind consciousness;

original: 不行緣色本性清淨不清淨、合離相，不行緣受、想、行、識本性清淨不清淨、合離相；
analyzed: 不行緣色本性清淨不清淨、合離相，不行緣受、想、行、識本性清淨不清淨、合離相；
translated: they do not engage in the characteristic of the purity or impurity, union or separation, of the fundamental nature of the conditions of form; they do not engage in the characteristic of the purity or impurity, union or separation, of the fundamental nature of the conditions of feeling, perception, formation, or consciousness;

original: 不行緣眼本性清淨不清淨、合離相，不行緣耳、鼻、舌、身、意本性清淨不清淨、合離相；
analyzed: 不行緣眼本性清淨不清淨、合離相，不行緣耳、鼻、舌、身、意本性清淨不清淨、合離相；
translated: they do not engage in the characteristic of the purity or impurity, union or separation, of the fundamental nature of the conditions of the eyes; they do not engage in the characteristic of the purity or impurity, union or separation, of the fundamental nature of the conditions of the ears, nose, tongue, body, or mind;

original: 不行緣色本性清淨不清淨、合離相，不行緣聲、香、味、觸、法本性清淨不清淨、合離相；
analyzed: 不行緣色本性清淨不清淨、合離相，不行緣聲、香、味、觸、法本性清淨不清淨、合離相；
translated: They do not engage in the characteristic of the fundamental nature of form being pure or impure, or of being united or separated; they do not engage in the characteristic of the fundamental nature of sound, smell, taste, touch, and dharmas being pure or impure, or of being united or separated.

original: 不行緣眼識本性清淨不清淨、合離相，不行緣耳、鼻、舌、身、意識本性清淨不清淨、合離相。
analyzed: 不行緣眼識本性清淨不清淨、合離相，不行緣耳、鼻、舌、身、意識本性清淨不清淨、合離相。
translated: They do not engage in the characteristic of the fundamental nature of eye consciousness being pure or impure, or of being united or separated; they do not engage in the characteristic of the fundamental nature of ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind consciousness being pure or impure, or of being united or separated.

original: 「不行色過去未來現在清淨不清淨、合離相，不行受、想、行、識過去未來現在清淨不清淨、合離相；
analyzed: 「不行色過去未來現在清淨不清淨、合離相，不行受、想、行、識過去未來現在清淨不清淨、合離相；
translated: They do not engage in the characteristic of form in the past, future, or present being pure or impure, or of being united or separated; they do not engage in the characteristic of feeling, perception, formation, and consciousness in the past, future, or present being pure or impure, or of being united or separated.

original: 不行眼過去未來現在清淨不清淨、合離相，不行耳、鼻、舌、身、意過去未來現在清淨不清淨、合離相；
analyzed: 不行眼過去未來現在清淨不清淨、合離相，不行耳、鼻、舌、身、意過去未來現在清淨不清淨、合離相；
translated: They do not engage in the characteristic of the eye in the past, future, or present being pure or impure, or of being united or separated; they do not engage in the characteristic of the ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind in the past, future, or present being pure or impure, or of being united or separated.

original: 不行色過去未來現在清淨不清淨、合離相，不行聲、香、味、觸、法過去未來現在清淨不清淨、合離相；
analyzed: 不行色過去未來現在清淨不清淨、合離相，不行聲、香、味、觸、法過去未來現在清淨不清淨、合離相；
translated: Do not engage in the past, future, or present purity or impurity, or combination or separation of form. Do not engage in the past, future, or present purity or impurity, or combination or separation of sound, smell, taste, touch, or dharmas.

original: 不行眼識過去未來現在清淨不清淨、合離相，不行耳、鼻、舌、身、意識過去未來現在清淨不清淨、合離相；
analyzed: 不行眼識過去未來現在清淨不清淨、合離相，不行耳、鼻、舌、身、意識過去未來現在清淨不清淨、合離相；
translated: Do not engage in the past, future, or present purity or impurity, or combination or separation of the eye consciousness. Do not engage in the past, future, or present purity or impurity, or combination or separation of the ear, nose, tongue, body, or mind consciousness.

original: 不行緣色過去未來現在清淨不清淨、合離相，不行緣受、想、行、識過去未來現在清淨不清淨、合離相；
analyzed: 不行緣色過去未來現在清淨不清淨、合離相，不行緣受、想、行、識過去未來現在清淨不清淨、合離相；
translated: Do not engage in the past, future, or present purity or impurity, or combination or separation of the conditions of form. Do not engage in the past, future, or present purity or impurity, or combination or separation of the conditions of feeling, perception, formation, or consciousness.

original: 不行緣眼過去未來現在清淨不清淨、合離相，不行緣耳、鼻、舌、身、意過去未來現在清淨不清淨、合離相；
analyzed: 不行緣眼過去未來現在清淨不清淨、合離相，不行緣耳、鼻、舌、身、意過去未來現在清淨不清淨、合離相；
translated: Do not engage in the past, future, or present purity or impurity, or combination or separation of the conditions of the eye. Do not engage in the past, future, or present purity or impurity, or combination or separation of the conditions of the ear, nose, tongue, body, or mind.

original: 不行緣色過去未來現在清淨不清淨、合離相，不行緣聲、香、味、觸、法過去未來現在清淨不清淨、合離相；
analyzed: 不行緣色過去未來現在清淨不清淨、合離相，不行緣聲、香、味、觸、法過去未來現在清淨不清淨、合離相；
translated: They do not engage in the characteristics of purity and impurity, union and separation, in relation to form of the past, future, or present. They do not engage in the characteristics of purity and impurity, union and separation, in relation to sound, smell, taste, touch, or dharmas of the past, future, or present.

original: 不行緣眼識過去未來現在清淨不清淨、合離相，不行緣耳、鼻、舌、身、意識過去未來現在清淨不清淨、合離相。
analyzed: 不行緣眼識過去未來現在清淨不清淨、合離相，不行緣耳、鼻、舌、身、意識過去未來現在清淨不清淨、合離相。
translated: They do not engage in the characteristics of purity and impurity, union and separation, in relation to eye consciousness of the past, future, or present. They do not engage in the characteristics of purity and impurity, union and separation, in relation to ear, nose, tongue, body, or mind consciousness of the past, future, or present.

original: 「善勇猛！
analyzed: 「善勇猛！
translated: Good son!

original: 若諸菩薩能如是行，則不與色若合若離，亦不與受、想、行、識若合若離；
analyzed: 若諸菩薩能如是行，則不與色若合若離，亦不與受、想、行、識若合若離；
translated: If bodhisattvas are able to practice in this way, then they are neither united with nor separate from form, and also neither united with nor separate from feeling, perception, formation, or consciousness;

original: 不與眼若合若離，亦不與耳、鼻、舌、身、意若合若離；
analyzed: 不與眼若合若離，亦不與耳、鼻、舌、身、意若合若離；
translated: they are neither united with nor separate from the eye, and also neither united with nor separate from the ear, nose, tongue, body, or mind;

original: 不與色若合若離，亦不與聲、香、味、觸、法若合若離；
analyzed: 不與色若合若離，亦不與聲、香、味、觸、法若合若離；
translated: they are neither united with nor separate from form, and also neither united with nor separate from sound, smell, taste, touch, or dharmas;

original: 不與眼識若合若離，亦不與耳、鼻、舌、身、意識若合若離；
analyzed: 不與眼識若合若離，亦不與耳、鼻、舌、身、意識若合若離；
translated: It is neither united nor separate from eye consciousness, nor is it united or separate from ear, nose, tongue, body, or mind consciousness;

original: 不與名、色若合若離，不與顛倒、見趣、諸蓋
analyzed: 不與名、色若合若離，不與顛倒、見趣、諸蓋
translated: It is neither united nor separate from name-and-form, nor is it united or separate from inverted views, entanglements,

original: 及諸愛行若合若離，不與欲、色、無色界若合🔽若離，不與貪、瞋、癡若合若離，不與我、有
analyzed: 及諸愛行若合若離，不與欲、色、無色界若合 若離，不與貪、瞋、癡若合若離，不與我、有
translated: or the various practices of craving; it is neither united nor separate from the realms of desire, form, or formlessness;

original: 情、命者、生者、養者、士夫、補特伽羅、意🔽生、儒童、作者、受者、知者、見者、有無有
analyzed: 情、命者、生者、養者、士夫、補特伽羅、意 生、儒童、作者、受者、知者、見者、有無有
translated: it is neither united nor separate from greed, anger, or delusion; it is neither united nor separate from the notions of self, sentient being, life, birth, nurture, person, pudgala, mind-born, youth, doer, experiencer, knower, seer, or existence or non-existence;

original: 想若合若離，不與斷、常若合若離，不與界、🔽處若合若離，不與有情界、法界若合若離，不
analyzed: 想若合若離，不與斷、常若合若離，不與界、 處若合若離，不與有情界、法界若合若離，不
translated: it is neither united nor separate from the notions of annihilation or permanence; it is neither united nor separate from the elements🔽or sense bases; it is neither united nor separate from the realms of sentient beings or dharmas; it is neither united nor separate from the realms of earth, water, fire, wind, space, or consciousness;

original: 與地、水、火、風、空、識界若合若離，不與
analyzed: 與地、水、火、風、空、識界若合若離，不與
translated: it is neither united nor separate from the realms of desire, form, or formlessness;🔽it is neither united nor separate from the realms of the eye, form, eye consciousness, or the other sense bases.

original: 緣起若合若離，不與五妙欲若合若離，不與雜
analyzed: 緣起若合若離，不與五妙欲若合若離，不與雜
translated: whether it arises in dependence on the five sense pleasures or not, it is not associated with or dissociated from

original: 染、清淨若合若離，不與布施、慳貪、持戒、
analyzed: 染、清淨若合若離，不與布施、慳貪、持戒、
translated: defilement or purity, not associated with or dissociated from generosity, stinginess, moral discipline,

original: 犯戒、安忍、忿恚、精進、懈怠、靜慮、散亂
analyzed: 犯戒、安忍、忿恚、精進、懈怠、靜慮、散亂
translated: transgressions, patience, anger, vigor, laziness, meditation, distraction,

original: 、妙慧、惡慧若合若離，不與念住、正斷、神
analyzed: 、妙慧、惡慧若合若離，不與念住、正斷、神
translated: wisdom, or foolishness, not associated with or dissociated from the applications of mindfulness, right efforts,

original: 足、根、力、覺支、道支若合若離，不與斷顛
analyzed: 足、根、力、覺支、道支若合若離，不與斷顛
translated: bases of supernatural power, faculties, powers, factors of awakening, or factors of the path, not associated with or dissociated from the elimination of

original: 倒等若合若離，不與靜慮、解脫、等持、等至
analyzed: 倒等若合若離，不與靜慮、解脫、等持、等至
translated: perverted views, etc., not associated with or dissociated from meditation, liberation, samādhi, or

original: 若合若離，不與苦、集、滅、道若合若離，不🔽與止、觀若合若離，不與明及解脫若合若離，
analyzed: 若合若離，不與苦、集、滅、道若合若離，不 與止、觀若合若離，不與明及解脫若合若離，
translated: attainment, not associated with or dissociated from suffering, its origin, its cessation, or the path, not🔽associated with or dissociated from tranquility or insight, not associated with or dissociated from illumination or liberation,

original: 不與解脫智見若合若離，不與無量、神通若合
analyzed: 不與解脫智見若合若離，不與無量、神通若合
translated: not associated with or dissociated from the knowledge and vision of liberation, not associated with or dissociated from the immeasurables or supernatural powers,

original: 若離，不與異生、聲聞、獨覺、菩薩、佛地若
analyzed: 若離，不與異生、聲聞、獨覺、菩薩、佛地若
translated: If it is separate, it is not combined with or separate from the stages of ordinary beings, hearers, solitary realizers, bodhisattvas, or buddhas.

original: 合若離，不與異生、聲聞、獨覺、菩薩、佛法
analyzed: 合若離，不與異生、聲聞、獨覺、菩薩、佛法
translated: It is not combined with or separate from the dharmas of ordinary beings, hearers, solitary realizers, bodhisattvas, or buddhas.

original: 若合若離，不與盡智、無生智、無造作智、無🔽著智若合若離，不與生死、涅槃若合若離，不
analyzed: 若合若離，不與盡智、無生智、無造作智、無 著智若合若離，不與生死、涅槃若合若離，不
translated: It is not combined with or separate from the cognition of extinction, the cognition of non-arising, the cognition of non-fabrication, or the cognition of non-attachment.🔽It is not combined with or separate from saṃsāra or nirvāṇa. It is not combined with or separate from the cognition, powers, and fearlessnesses of a buddha.

original: 與佛智、力、無畏等若合若離，不與相好圓滿
analyzed: 與佛智、力、無畏等若合若離，不與相好圓滿
translated: It is not combined with or separate from the perfection of the major and minor marks.

original: 若合若離，不與莊嚴佛土若合若離，不與聲聞🔽圓滿若合若離，不與獨覺圓滿若合若離，不與
analyzed: 若合若離，不與莊嚴佛土若合若離，不與聲聞 圓滿若合若離，不與獨覺圓滿若合若離，不與
translated: It is not combined with or separate from the adornment of a buddha land. It is not combined with or separate from the perfection of hearers.

original: 菩薩圓滿若合若離，何以故？
analyzed: 菩薩圓滿若合若離，何以故？
translated: It is not combined with or separate from the perfection of solitary realizers. It is not combined with or separate from the perfection of bodhisattvas. Why is this?🔽Because,

original: 善勇猛！
analyzed: 善勇猛！
translated: Good and Brave One,

original: 以一切法無合離故。
analyzed: 以一切法無合離故。
translated: all dharmas are neither combined nor separate.

original: 「善勇猛！
analyzed: 「善勇猛！
translated: Good and Brave One,

original: 非一切法為合、離故而現在前。
analyzed: 非一切法為合、離故而現在前。
translated: all dharmas do not appear in order to be combined or separated.

original: 善勇猛！
analyzed: 善勇猛！
translated: Subhūti!

original: 合者謂常，離者謂斷。
analyzed: 合者謂常，離者謂斷。
translated: Union means permanence, and separation means annihilation.

original: 善勇猛！
analyzed: 善勇猛！
translated: Subhūti!

original: 一切法性不由覺察有合有離。
analyzed: 一切法性不由覺察有合有離。
translated: The nature of all dharmas is not united or separated through realization.

original: 善勇猛！
analyzed: 善勇猛！
translated: Subhūti!

original: 一切法性不為合故、離故現前。
analyzed: 一切法性不為合故、離故現前。
translated: The nature of all dharmas does not manifest for the sake of union or separation.

original: 善勇猛！
analyzed: 善勇猛！
translated: Subhūti!

original: 若諸法性為合、為離現在前者，則應諸法可得作者、使作者、起者、使起者、受者、使受者、知者、使知者、見者、使見者、合者、使合者、離者、使離者，如來亦應施設諸法此是作者、使作者乃至離者、使離者。
analyzed: 若諸法性為合、為離現在前者，則應諸法可得作者、使作者、起者、使起者、受者、使受者、知者、使知者、見者、使見者、合者、使合者、離者、使離者，如來亦應施設諸法此是作者、使作者乃至離者、使離者。
translated: If the nature of all dharmas manifested for the sake of union or separation, then one would be able to find an agent, an instigator, an origination, an instigator of origination, an experiencer, an instigator of experience, a knower, an instigator of knowing, a seer, an instigator of seeing, a uniter, an instigator of union, a separator, or an instigator of separation, and the Tathāgata would also have to establish dharmas as this is the agent, the instigator, up to the separator, or the instigator of separation.

original: 善勇猛！
analyzed: 善勇猛！
translated: Subhūti!

original: 以諸法性不為合、離現在前故，諸法無有作者、使作者乃至離者、使離者少分可得、不可得故，佛不施設。
analyzed: 以諸法性不為合、離現在前故，諸法無有作者、使作者乃至離者、使離者少分可得、不可得故，佛不施設。
translated: Because the nature of dharmas is not present as either combined or separated, and because one cannot obtain even the slightest bit of a dharma that is created, has a creator, or is separated, or has a separator, the Buddha does not establish them.

original: 善勇猛！
analyzed: 善勇猛！
translated: Good son!

original: 諸法皆由顛倒所起，非諸顛倒有合、有離，何以故？
analyzed: 諸法皆由顛倒所起，非諸顛倒有合、有離，何以故？
translated: All dharmas arise from delusion. Delusion is neither combined nor separated. Why is this?

original: 善勇猛！
analyzed: 善勇猛！
translated: Good son!

original: 諸顛倒事無少可得，亦不可得實生起性，何以故？
analyzed: 諸顛倒事無少可得，亦不可得實生起性，何以故？
translated: The state of delusion cannot be obtained in the slightest, nor can the nature of true arising be obtained. Why is this?

original: 善勇猛！
analyzed: 善勇猛！
translated: Good son!

original: 顛倒非實、虛妄、誑詐、空、無所有，非於此中有少實法可名顛倒。
analyzed: 顛倒非實、虛妄、誑詐、空、無所有，非於此中有少實法可名顛倒。
translated: Delusion is not real, false, deceptive, empty, and nonexistent. There is not even the slightest real dharma within it that can be called delusion.

original: 「善勇猛！
analyzed: 「善勇猛！
translated: Good son!

original: 夫顛倒者惑亂有情、施設有情，諸有情類虛妄分別之所顯現，令諸有情妄生恃執、動轉、戲論。
analyzed: 夫顛倒者惑亂有情、施設有情，諸有情類虛妄分別之所顯現，令諸有情妄生恃執、動轉、戲論。
translated: Delusion confuses sentient beings and establishes sentient beings. The various kinds of sentient beings are manifested by false discrimination, causing sentient beings to give rise to vain reliance and attachment, agitation and frivolous discourse.

original: 善勇猛！
analyzed: 善勇猛！
translated: Good son!

original: 如以空拳誑惑童竪，彼無知故謂有實物。
analyzed: 如以空拳誑惑童竪，彼無知故謂有實物。
translated: It is like using an empty fist to deceive and delude a child, because they do not know and think there is a real object.

original: 愚夫異生亦復如是，虛妄顛倒之所誑惑，於一切法非合離性妄見合離謂為實有。
analyzed: 愚夫異生亦復如是，虛妄顛倒之所誑惑，於一切法非合離性妄見合離謂為實有。
translated: Foolish ordinary beings are also like this. They are deceived by false inversion, and falsely see the nature of combination and separation in all dharmas, considering it to be truly existent.

original: 愚癡顛倒於無實中起有實想難可解脫，是故一切愚夫異生妄見合離，顛倒繫縛馳流生死，謂合得、合住、合見、合執。
analyzed: 愚癡顛倒於無實中起有實想難可解脫，是故一切愚夫異生妄見合離，顛倒繫縛馳流生死，謂合得、合住、合見、合執。
translated: The deluded inversion of the ignorant is difficult to liberate from the non-real and the arising of the thought of real existence. Therefore, all foolish ordinary beings falsely see combination and separation, bound by inversion, running in birth and death, considering combination to be attainment, combination to be abiding, combination to be seeing, and combination to be grasping.

original: 有合故便執有離，謂除遣合而得離故。
analyzed: 有合故便執有離，謂除遣合而得離故。
translated: Because of the existence of combination, one then grasps at the existence of separation, considering the elimination of combination to be the attainment of separation.

original: 善勇猛！
analyzed: 善勇猛！
translated: Good son!

original: 若處有合是處有離，若於合中無得、無恃、不起執著，亦不見離。
analyzed: 若處有合是處有離，若於合中無得、無恃、不起執著，亦不見離。
translated: If there is combination in a place, there is separation in that place. If there is no attainment in combination, no reliance, and no arising of grasping and attachment, one also does not see separation.

original: 善勇猛！
analyzed: 善勇猛！
translated: Good son!

original: 若於離中有得、有恃、起執著者，彼便有合，與生死苦未可別離。
analyzed: 若於離中有得、有恃、起執著者，彼便有合，與生死苦未可別離。
translated: If there is attainment, reliance, and the arising of grasping and attachment in separation, then there is combination, and one is not yet able to be separated from the suffering of birth and death.

original: 善勇猛！
analyzed: 善勇猛！
translated: Subhūti!

original: 是諸菩薩觀此義故，與諸法性非合非離，亦不為法若合若離，而有所作或有修學。
analyzed: 是諸菩薩觀此義故，與諸法性非合非離，亦不為法若合若離，而有所作或有修學。
translated: These bodhisattvas, contemplating this meaning, are neither united nor separated from the nature of dharmas, and also do not act or study for the sake of uniting or separating with dharmas.

original: 「善勇猛！
analyzed: 「善勇猛！
translated: Subhūti!

original: 是諸菩薩遍知合、離，修行般若波羅蜜多。
analyzed: 是諸菩薩遍知合、離，修行般若波羅蜜多。
translated: These bodhisattvas thoroughly understand union and separation, and practice prajñā-pāramitā.

original: 善勇猛！
analyzed: 善勇猛！
translated: Subhūti!

original: 如是菩薩安住般若波羅蜜多，速能圓滿一切智法。
analyzed: 如是菩薩安住般若波羅蜜多，速能圓滿一切智法。
translated: In this way, bodhisattvas abiding in prajñā-pāramitā can quickly perfect the dharmas of omniscience.

original: 「復次，善勇猛！
analyzed: 「復次，善勇猛！
translated: Furthermore, Subhūti!

original: 若諸菩薩修行般若波羅蜜多，不行色著、無著，不行受、想、行、識著、無著；
analyzed: 若諸菩薩修行般若波羅蜜多，不行色著、無著，不行受、想、行、識著、無著；
translated: If bodhisattvas practice prajñā-pāramitā, they do not practice attachment or non-attachment to form, and do not practice attachment or non-attachment to feeling, perception, formation, or consciousness;

original: 不行眼著、無著，不行耳、鼻、舌、身、意著、無著；
analyzed: 不行眼著、無著，不行耳、鼻、舌、身、意著、無著；
translated: they do not practice attachment or non-attachment to the eye, and do not practice attachment or non-attachment to the ear, nose, tongue, body, or mind;

original: 不行色著、無著，不行聲、香、味、觸、法著、無著；
analyzed: 不行色著、無著，不行聲、香、味、觸、法著、無著；
translated: they do not practice attachment or non-attachment to form, and do not practice attachment or non-attachment to sound, smell, taste, touch, or dharmas;

original: 不行眼識著、無著，不行耳、鼻、舌、身、意識著、無著。
analyzed: 不行眼識著、無著，不行耳、鼻、舌、身、意識著、無著。
translated: Do not engage in the attachment or non-attachment of eye consciousness, do not engage in the attachment or non-attachment of ear, nose, tongue, body, or mind consciousness.

original: 「不行色著、無著清淨，不行受、想、行、識著、無著清淨；
analyzed: 「不行色著、無著清淨，不行受、想、行、識著、無著清淨；
translated: Do not engage in the purity of attachment or non-attachment to form, do not engage in the purity of attachment or non-attachment to feeling, perception, formation, or consciousness;

original: 不行眼著、無著清淨，不行耳、鼻、舌、身、意著、無著清淨；
analyzed: 不行眼著、無著清淨，不行耳、鼻、舌、身、意著、無著清淨；
translated: Do not engage in the purity of attachment or non-attachment to the eye, do not engage in the purity of attachment or non-attachment to the ear, nose, tongue, body, or mind;

original: 不行色著、無著清淨，不行聲、香、味、觸、法著、無著清淨；
analyzed: 不行色著、無著清淨，不行聲、香、味、觸、法著、無著清淨；
translated: Do not engage in the purity of attachment or non-attachment to form, do not engage in the purity of attachment or non-attachment to sound, smell, taste, touch, or dharmas;

original: 不行眼識著、無著清淨，不行耳、鼻、舌、身、意識著、無著清淨。
analyzed: 不行眼識著、無著清淨，不行耳、鼻、舌、身、意識著、無著清淨。
translated: Do not engage in the purity of attachment or non-attachment of eye consciousness, do not engage in the purity of attachment or non-attachment of ear, nose, tongue, body, or mind consciousness.

original: 「不行色著、無著所緣，不行受、想、行、識著、無著所緣；
analyzed: 「不行色著、無著所緣，不行受、想、行、識著、無著所緣；
translated: Do not engage in the objective supports of attachment or non-attachment to form, do not engage in the objective supports of attachment or non-attachment to feeling, perception, formation, or consciousness;

original: 不行眼著、無著所緣，不行耳、鼻、舌、身、意著、無著所緣；
analyzed: 不行眼著、無著所緣，不行耳、鼻、舌、身、意著、無著所緣；
translated: Do not engage in the object of attachment and non-attachment of the eyes, do not engage in the object of attachment and non-attachment of the ears, nose, tongue, body, and mind;

original: 不行色著、無著所緣，不行聲、香、味、觸、法著、無著所緣；
analyzed: 不行色著、無著所緣，不行聲、香、味、觸、法著、無著所緣；
translated: Do not engage in the object of attachment and non-attachment of form, do not engage in the object of attachment and non-attachment of sound, smell, taste, touch, and dharmas;

original: 不行眼識著、無著所緣，不行耳、鼻、舌、身、意識著、無著所緣。
analyzed: 不行眼識著、無著所緣，不行耳、鼻、舌、身、意識著、無著所緣。
translated: Do not engage in the object of attachment and non-attachment of the eye consciousness, do not engage in the object of attachment and non-attachment of the ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind consciousnesses.

original: 「不行色著、無著合、離，不行受、想、行、識著、無著合、離；
analyzed: 「不行色著、無著合、離，不行受、想、行、識著、無著合、離；
translated: Do not engage in the union and separation of attachment and non-attachment of form, do not engage in the union and separation of attachment and non-attachment of feeling, perception, mental formations, and consciousness;

analyzed: 不行眼著、無著合、離，不行耳、鼻、舌、身、意著、無著合、離；
translated: Do not engage in the union and separation of attachment and non-attachment of the eyes, do not engage in the union and separation of attachment and non-attachment of the ears, nose, tongue, body, and mind;

original: 不行色著、無著合、離，不行聲、香、味、觸、法著、無著合、離；
analyzed: 不行色著、無著合、離，不行聲、香、味、觸、法著、無著合、離；
translated: Do not engage in the union and separation of attachment and non-attachment of form, do not engage in the union and separation of attachment and non-attachment of sound, smell, taste, touch, and dharmas;

original: 不行眼識著、無著合、離，不行耳、鼻、舌、身、意識著、無著合、離。
analyzed: 不行眼識著、無著合、離，不行耳、鼻、舌、身、意識著、無著合、離。
translated: Do not engage in the attachment or non-attachment, combination or separation of eye consciousness. Do not engage in the attachment or non-attachment, combination or separation of ear, nose, tongue, body, or mind consciousness.

original: 「不行色著、無著清淨、合、離，不行受、想、行、識著、無著清淨、合、離；
analyzed: 「不行色著、無著清淨、合、離，不行受、想、行、識著、無著清淨、合、離；
translated: Do not engage in the purity of attachment or non-attachment to form, combination or separation. Do not engage in the purity of attachment or non-attachment to feeling, perception, formation, or consciousness, combination or separation;

original: 不行眼著、無著清淨、合、離，不行耳、鼻、舌、身、意著、無著清淨、合、離；
analyzed: 不行眼著、無著清淨、合、離，不行耳、鼻、舌、身、意著、無著清淨、合、離；
translated: Do not engage in the purity of attachment or non-attachment to the eye, combination or separation. Do not engage in the purity of attachment or non-attachment to the ear, nose, tongue, body, or mind, combination or separation;

original: 不行色著、無著清淨、合、離，不行聲、香、味、觸、法著、無著清淨、合、離；
analyzed: 不行色著、無著清淨、合、離，不行聲、香、味、觸、法著、無著清淨、合、離；
translated: Do not engage in the purity of attachment or non-attachment to form, combination or separation. Do not engage in the purity of attachment or non-attachment to sound, smell, taste, touch, or dharmas, combination or separation;

original: 不行眼識著、無著清淨、合、離，不行耳、鼻、舌、身、意識著、無著清淨、合、離。
